title: Echoes Arrival
tagline: in which the Dunmar Fellowship traverses treacherous waters and ancient ruins
summary: The Dunmar Fellowship concludes their business in Tollen, investing in crucial components and leaving assets with Adam Gower.
Members engage in personal endeavors, including contemplation, community bonding, gardening, and ship enhancements.
They depart Tollen and navigate to Cymea, then proceed to the Edge of Echoes where they are ambushed by water elementals.
Overcoming elemental challenges, they explore an overgrown stone hall and encounter a mysterious woman in Drankorian ruins.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship faces personal endeavors in Tollen and elemental dangers at the Edge of Echoes before reaching mysterious Drankorian ruins.
location: from Tollen to the Edge of Echoes, Cymea
